item.title: Testing complete IoT systems with hardware
item.description: Article on automated end-to-end testing of an IoT system
item.dc:creator: Andre Madarang

item.title: Docker Crash Course
item.description: This document provides an introduction and reference guide for developing with the containerisation tool Docker and is by no means exhaustive.
item.dc:creator: Andre Madarang

item.title: Scan to Listen
item.description: Article on the development of a React Native mobile app Scan to Listen, for scanning books to find audiobooks on Audible and scanning CDs and vinyl to find albums on Spotify
item.dc:creator: Andre Madarang

item.title: How to execute terminal commands with your voice on Linux
item.description: Proof of concept use of the open source NLP tool 'voice2json' to execute arbitrary commands in a linux terminal
item.dc:creator: Andre Madarang

item.title: Experiments with Generative Art using P5.js
item.description: A show and tell about using the P5.js library to create generative art
item.dc:creator: Andre Madarang

item.title: Visualizing CyBOK References with D3
item.description: Using the D3 graphing library to visualise all references within the Cyber Security Body of Knowledge
item.dc:creator: Andre Madarang

item.title: Creating a Twitter clone with both Copilot agent mode and Cursor
item.description: Creating a Twitter Clone from scratch, first with Copilot Agent and then with Cursor
item.dc:creator: Andre Madarang

item.title: AI assisted workflow for Django query optimizations
item.description: Combining Copilot, Postgres MCP Server, Django-Silk and Playwright for AI assisted query optimizations
item.dc:creator: Andre Madarang
